title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker with microphone. Designed in sleek black, this speaker is perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, and even pool use. 

Featuring advanced technologies, including PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducer, this speaker delivers deep, clear, and immersive audio quality. No matter where you are, enjoy a remarkable sound experience that will elevate your music, podcasts, and calls.

Not only does the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker provide outstanding audio, but it is also built to withstand any environment. With an IP67 waterproof rating, it can handle water submersion and even floats on water. It is also dust-resistant, shock-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV light resistant, ensuring durability for all your outdoor activities.

The Lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge. Recharging is quick and easy with the included USB-C cable, taking approximately 4 hours to fully charge. The built-in microphone allows for hands-free calling, while Siri and Google Assistant access make it even more convenient.

Connect seamlessly to your devices within a range of up to 30 feet using Bluetooth technology. Additionally, the Bose Connect App offers app support, software updates, and customizable settings, enhancing your overall experience.

Designed for maximum portability, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker features a compact design and a utility loop, making it easy to hold and store. Its rugged construction ensures it can handle any adventure you embark on.

Upgrade your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Order now and enjoy exceptional sound quality, durability, and portability wherever you go.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the perfect portable speaker with microphone for all your audio needs. With its sleek and stylish black design, this speaker is not only aesthetically pleasing but also packed with incredible features.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio quality like never before, thanks to the advanced audio technologies of the Bose SoundLink Flex. With PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer, you'll enjoy exceptional sound with every use.

This speaker is not only impressive in terms of sound quality but also in its durability. It is waterproof with an IP67 rating, meaning it can withstand being submerged in water. It even floats on water, making it ideal for pool use or outdoor adventures. Additionally, it is dust-resistant, shock-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV light-resistant, ensuring it can handle any environment.

The Lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge. Charging is a breeze with the included USB-C cable, and it takes approximately 4 hours to fully charge the speaker. Plus, the built-in microphone allows for hands-free calling and access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant.

For added convenience, the Bose SoundLink Flex is compatible with the Bose Connect App, providing app support, software updates, and customizable settings. Its compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry and store, and the connection range of up to 30 feet gives you the freedom to move around without sacrificing sound quality.

Whether you're traveling, enjoying outdoor activities, or relaxing by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is the perfect companion. Get yours today and elevate your audio experience to new heights.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, a portable speaker with a built-in microphone that delivers an exceptional audio experience. With its sleek black color, this speaker is perfect for any setting.

Featuring advanced audio technology, including PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer, this speaker provides deep, clear, and immersive sound quality. Whether you're listening to music or taking calls, you'll enjoy an unmatched audio experience.

Not only is the SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker designed for superior sound, but it is also built to withstand various conditions. With an IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker is fully waterproof and even floats on water. It is also dust-resistant, shock-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV light resistant, making it ideal for travel, outdoor adventures, and pool use.

The speaker is powered by a long-lasting lithium-ion battery that provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge. Charging is quick and easy with the included USB-C cable, taking approximately 4 hours for a full charge. Plus, with the built-in microphone, you can easily access voice assistants like Siri and Google Assistant for hands-free control.

Stay connected and in control with the Bose Connect App, which offers additional features and customizable settings. The speaker has a connectivity range of up to 30 feet, allowing you to move around freely without losing connection.

With its compact design and utility loop, the SoundLink Flex is highly portable and easy to hold and store. It is perfect for on-the-go use and can withstand drops and rough handling.

Experience the best in portable audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Upgrade your sound and bring your music anywhere with this versatile speaker.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, a portable speaker with a built-in microphone that ensures you never miss a beat. This sleek and stylish speaker comes in a classic black color, making it the perfect accessory for any occasion.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio quality with the Bose SoundLink Flex. Featuring advanced technologies such as PositionIQ and custom-engineered transducers, this speaker delivers exceptional sound performance that will elevate your listening experience.

Not only does the SoundLink Flex offer outstanding audio, but it is also designed to withstand the elements. With its IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker is resistant to water, dust, and shocks, making it suitable for outdoor adventures or even poolside use. It even floats on water, ensuring that your music stays with you wherever you go.

The Bose SoundLink Flex is equipped with a long-lasting lithium-ion battery that provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge. Charging is a breeze with the included USB-C cable, and the speaker fully charges in approximately 4 hours.

Stay connected and in control with the built-in microphone and virtual assistant access to Siri and Google Assistant. The Bose Connect App provides additional support and allows you to customize settings according to your preferences.

Designed with portability in mind, the SoundLink Flex features a compact design and a utility loop for easy carrying and storage. Its connection range of up to 30 feet ensures a seamless wireless experience.

Whether you're traveling, enjoying outdoor activities, or simply relaxing by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is the perfect companion. Get yours today and elevate your audio experience to new heights.
